Container.Name: Pangolin
Container.Overview:
Pangolin (https://github.com/fosrl/pangolin) is a tunneled reverse proxy server and dashboard UI with identity and access control built in. Pangolin can optionally be used in Local mode as a normal reverse proxy for users who don't want/need tunnels, but still want to take advantage of its excellent authentication features.
Chat with us on Discord!
https://discord.gg/HCJR8Xhme4
Container.Category: Security: Tools: Network:Web Network:Proxy Network:Management Network:VPN Network:Other

Config.Name: Dashboard URL
Config.Description: This the external URL by which you will access the Pangolin dashboard for management and authentication

Config.Name: Base Domain
Config.Description: This is the base domain to be used as the root of all subdomains

Config.Name: Server Admin Email
Config.Description: This user will be considered the server admin

Config.Name: Generate Traefik Config
Config.Description: This will generate basic Traefik config files for use with Pangolin at /traefik. This will overwrite any manual changes you make to the files. WARNING: Disable this if you make any manual edits to the Pangolin Traefik config files

Config.Name: Host Port 1
Config.Description: NOTE: If you change this, the container port and SERVER_NEXTPORT must match

Config.Name: Host Port 2
Config.Description: NOTE: If you change this, the container port and SERVER_NEXTPORT must match

Config.Name: Host Port 3
Config.Description: NOTE: IF you change this, the container port and SERVER_INTERNALPORT must match
